module.name: CheckBoxThemed
module.short: Implements a custom-drawn check box control drawn using theme services

descr.p: checkboxthemed.pas contains classes used to implements a custom-drawn check box control drawn using theme services.

element.name: TCheckBoxThemedActionLink.AssignClient
element.short: Sets the control used as the client in the action link

element.name: TCheckBoxThemedActionLink.SetChecked
element.short: Sets the value in Checked for the client control when linked

element.name: TCheckBoxThemedActionLink.IsCheckedLinked
element.short: Determines if an Action is linked to the client control and if the Checked values are in sync

element.name: TCheckBoxThemedActionLink.IsCheckedLinked.Result
element.short: True when an Action exists for the client control and they share the same Checked value

element.name: TCheckBoxThemedActionLinkClass
element.short: Class type used to create new instances of TCheckBoxThemedActionLink

descr.p: TCheckBoxThemedActionLinkClass is a TCheckBoxThemedActionLink class type.

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed
element.short: Implements the base class for a custom-drawn check box control

descr.p: TCustomCheckBoxThemed is a TCustomControl descendant which implements the base class for a custom-drawn check box control.
Do not create instances of TCustomCheckBoxThemed; use the TCheckBoxThemed descendant.

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.GetChecked
element.short: Gets the value for the Check property

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.GetChecked.Result
element.short: Value for the property

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.SetAlignment
element.short: Sets the value for the Alignment property

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.SetAlignment.AValue
element.short: New value for the property

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.SetCheckBoxHovered
element.short: Sets an internal flag used to track mouse hover, and redraws the control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.SetCheckBoxHovered.AValue
element.short: New value for the internal flag

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.SetChecked
element.short: Sets the value for the Checked property

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.SetChecked.AValue
element.short: New value for the property

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.SetState
element.short: Sets the value for the State property

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.SetState.AValue
element.short: New value for the property

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.GetCheckBoxSize
element.short: Gets the dimensions for the check box in the control scaled to the given display density

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.GetCheckBoxSize.Result
element.short: TSize instance with the dimensions for the check box

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.GetCheckBoxSize.PixelsPerInch
element.short: Design-time PPI setting used to scale to the PPI setting for the screen

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.CheckBoxPressed
element.short: Internal flag used to track key or mouse state in the control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.KnobPosUnchecked
element.short: Not used in the current implementation

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.KnobPosChecked
element.short: Not used in the current implementation

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.KnobPosGrayed
element.short: Not used in the current implementation

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.CalculatePreferredSize
element.short: Calculates the preferred height and width for the control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.CMBiDiModeChanged
element.short: Handles the CM_BIDIMODECHANGED control message

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.CMBiDiModeChanged.Message
element.short: Control message examined in the method

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.CMEnabledChanged
element.short: Handles the CM_ENABLEDCHANGED control message

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.CMEnabledChanged.Message
element.short: Control message examined in the method

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.DialogChar
element.short: Handles a message with an accelerator key for the control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.DialogChar.Result
element.short: True when the key is handled in the method

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.DialogChar.Message
element.short: Message with the key event examined in the method

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.DoClick
element.short: Performs actions needed when the control is clicked

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.DoEnter
element.short: Performs actions needed when the control is entered (receives input focus)

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.DoExit
element.short: Performs actions needed when the control is exited (loses input focus)

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.GetActionLinkClass
element.short: Gets the class reference used to create the action link for the control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.KeyDown
element.short: Handles key down events for the control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.KeyDown.Key
element.short: Key code examined in method

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.KeyDown.Shift
element.short: Shift, Alt, or Ctrl modifier for the key

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.KeyUp
element.short: Handles key up events for the control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.KeyUp.Key
element.short: Key code examined in method

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.KeyUp.Shift
element.short: Shift, Alt, or Ctrl modifier for the key

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.MouseDown
element.short: Handles mouse down events for the control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.MouseEnter
element.short: Handles hover state when the mouse cursor enters the control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.MouseLeave
element.short: Handles hover state when the mouse cursor leaves the control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.MouseUp
element.short: Handles mouse up events for the control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.Paint
element.short: Draws the control

descr.p: Paint is an overridden method in TCustomCheckBoxThemed. It calls the inherited method to signal the default OnPaint event handler (when assigned). It calls PaintSelf which implements the custom drawing method used for the themed check box control.

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.TextChanged
element.short: Redraws the control when the caption has been changed

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.WMSize
element.short: Handles the WM_SIZE message for the control and redraws the control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.WMSize.Message
element.short: Window message examined in the method

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.CheckBoxHovered
element.short: Protected property used to track mouse hover for the control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.CheckFromAction
element.short: Protected property used to track the Checked state in the ActionLink/Action for the control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.cFocusBorder
element.short: Internal constant with the space reserved for the focus border in the control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.cIndent
element.short: Internal constant with the space reserved for padding in the control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.PaintSelf
element.short: Renders a check box control using the specified parameters

descr.p: PaintSelf is a class method used to render a custom-drawn check box control using the parameters passed to the method.

PaintSelf calculates the size and position for both the caption and the check box in the control using the theme element details in theme services. This includes use of the ARightToLeft parameter in DrawText flags. ThemeServices.DrawText is called to render the caption for the control. ThemeServices.DrawElement is called to draw the check box using the hovered, pressed, and checked state values for the control.
Canvas is the TCanvas instance where the control is drawn.
PaintSelf is called from the Paint method, and occurs after the inherited OnPaint event handler been signalled (when assigned).

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.PaintSelf.ACanvas
element.short: Canvas for a check box control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.PaintSelf.ACaption
element.short: Caption text for a check box control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.PaintSelf.ARect
element.short: Rectangle with the coordinates for a check box control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.PaintSelf.AState
element.short: Checked state for a check box control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.PaintSelf.ARightToLeft
element.short: Alignment for caption in the check box control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.PaintSelf.AHovered
element.short: True if the mouse is hovered over the check box control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.PaintSelf.APressed
element.short: True if the check box control is in the pressed state (mouse down)

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.PaintSelf.AFocused
element.short: True if the check box control has input focus

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.PaintSelf.AAlignment
element.short: Left-to-Right alignment for the content in the check box control

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.PaintSelf.AEnabled
element.short: True if the control is drawn in the enabled state

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance

descr.p: Create is the overridden constructor for the class instance, and calls the inherited constructor on entry. Create sets the accessibility role and control style flags needed for the control. Create also sets the default values for properties, including:

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.Alignment
element.short: Horizontal alignment for the caption text in the control

descr.p: Alignment is a TLeftRight property which contains the horizontal alignment used for the control.

The value in Alignment is used in the Paint and PaintSelf methods. It determines the alignment for Caption displayed for the control is drawn. taLeftJustify aligns the caption to the left of the check box, while taRightJustify aligns the caption to the right side of the check box.
The default value for the property is taRightJustify.
Setting a new value for the property calls the Invalidate method which forces the control to be redrawn.

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.AllowGrayed
element.short: Indicates if the control can use the "grayed" state

descr.p: AllowGrayed is a Boolean property which indicates if the control can be displayed using its "grayed" state. This indicates that the control is disabled or has an undetermined state value. The default value for the property is False.

AllowGrayed is used to determine the new value for the State property when the control is clicked, or when handling key events in the control. When AllowGrayed is True, a click event changes State from cbUnchecked, to cbGrayed, to cbChecked and then back to cbUnchecked. When AllowGrayed is False, the State value is toggled between cbUnchecked and cbChecked using the Checked property.

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.Checked
element.short: Provides access to the checked state for the control as a Boolean value

descr.p: Checked is a Boolean property used to read or write the checked or unchecked state for the control as a Boolean value.

Checked is True when the value in the State property is cbChecked. Any other value in State causes Checked to contain False (including cbGrayed). Setting a new value for the property causes State to change to either cbChecked (for True) or cbUnchecked (for False).
Use State to set the checked state for the control using the 3-state values in the TCheckBoxState enumeration.
The default value for the property is False.

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.State
element.short: Contains the checked, unchecked, or grayed state for the check box control

descr.p: State is a TCheckBoxState property which contains the checked, unchecked, or grayed state for the check box control. The default value for the property is cbUnchecked.
At run-time, setting a new value in State causes several processes to be performed:

ul.li: Signals the OnEditingDone event handler (when assigned).
Signals the OnChange event handler (when assigned).
Signals the OnClick event handler (when assigned) if an Action is not used for the control.
Executes the Action (via the ActionLink) when the new property value is different than the Checked state for the Action.
Calls Invalidate to force the control to be redrawn.

descr.p: None of these actions are performed at design-time, during LCL streaming, or when the control is freed.

State is related to the Checked property. Checked is True when State contains cbChecked, or False for any other value in State. Setting the value in Checked causes the value in State to be toggled between cbChecked and cbUnchecked.

The value in State is updated when the accelerator character or a click event is handled for the control. Its value is used in the Paint and PaintSelf methods to determine how the themed check box is drawn for the control.

element.name: TCustomCheckBoxThemed.OnChange
element.short: Event handler signalled when the value for the control is changed

descr.p: OnChange is a TNotifyEvent property with the event handler signalled when the value for the control is changed.

OnChange is signalled when the value in State or Checked is modified. It occurs after the OnEditingDone event handler and before the OnClick event handler (or execution of the Action) for the control.
Applications must implement and assign an object procedure to the property to respond to the event notification.

element.name: TCheckBoxThemed
element.short: Implements a custom-drawn check box control

descr.p: TCheckBoxThemed is a TCustomCheckBoxThemed descendant which implements a custom-drawn check box control. It implements a custom paint method to render the control using theme services. TCheckBoxThemed is the type used to implement check box controls used in both the Object Inspector and Property editors in the Lazarus IDE.
TCheckBoxThemed sets the visibility and default values for properties defined in an ancestor class.
The default value for the property is True in TCheckBoxThemed.
The default value for the property is True in TCheckBoxThemed.
